resources.string: Tap the screen for a minimum of 15 times to conclude the single touch test result …!
Swipe the complete screen where a green color canvas is drawn for the swiped area within 30 seconds from the start of the test. As for the report, we need a minimum of 95 % draw area coverage …!
Tap the screen with more than 3 finger at a time to know the number of touches at a time
Try zooming the device to a minimum of 4x and also rotate the image to 180 degrees to conclude the Zoom and Rotate screen test …!
A sample music is played for a time period of 10 seconds with a varied pitch. Please acknowledge it, if you hear the music with varied pitch for speaker test result…!
Device will be vibrated for 5 seconds to conclude the vibration test result …!
User is allowed to speak something where the same text is printed as a preview for the users acknowledgement to conclude the microphone test result …!
Device rings for 5 seconds to conclude the ringtone test..!
Device rings with alarm tone for 5 seconds to conclude the alarm test..!
Device rings with notification tone to conclude the notification test..!
A list of available Wi-Fi are shown where the user can connect to the preferred network by manually providing the Wi-Fi password..!
A list of paired and scanned devices are shown where the user can connect and share a file..!
Based on the latitude and longitude, the users location is displayed on the map.
Please move the device for accelerometer values. When the device accelerometer reaches the threshold value, test concludes..!
Please rotate the device for gyroscope values. When the device magnitude reaches the threshold value, test concludes..!
Based on the device light sensor, values are displayed for a specific period of 5 seconds..!
The captured image is shown as a preview for user acknowledgement for the camera test result..!
